name: Puzzle Me - The VR Jigsaw Game
name_original: Puzzle Me - The VR Jigsaw Game
description:
Puzzle Me - All the fun of jigsaws, none of the frustration! Unless you want it :)

The ultimate jigsaw puzzle experience is here! Designed from the ground up for VR and taking advantage of the unique features and freedom of Virtual Reality - it is the most accessive and most intuitive way of solving jigsaw puzzles. Probably even beating the real thing!

With a range of unique difficulty options it can be the most zen and relaxing experience, the most mind bending challenge and everything in between.

With more puzzles and unique features on the way, this is the go-to game for ALL jigsaw puzzle fans - even those who don’t know that they are ;)

Give it a try and join our Discord community where you can share your feedback and ideas.

Game Features

Simple & intuitive Controls

Solving outside of the canvas.

Zen Mode

Clutter free smooth experience! Small tray with only solvable pieces.

Simple Mode

Shows only solvable pieces.

Expert Mode

Double sided pieces for extra challenge.
